column5: my first report for 2017 went out to explore sturgeon some more took jiffy with me, was walking so really 1/2 mile radius from my house to wet for sled. after couple hours finally found some live weed beds in 8 10 ft of water, drilled maybe 8 holes in area went and retrieved gear not a single fish was harmed that day lol now i know where to start need to go get more pinheads gonna break it down and go at it in a couple hours
We all have days like that, good luck with the afternoon bite!
